title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the interactive areas such as the banner with tool buttons, the navigation frame, or the content frame before the tab key starts working.
OB: On March 26, 2002, on Windows 2000, when I launch the Help view, the tab key does not perform any action.
EB: The tab key should allow me to navigate through the interactive elements of the Help view without having to click on them first.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key without clicking on any interactive area.
3. Notice that the tab key does not perform any action.
